Netflix hosted its Tudum global fan event over the weekend, and many new trailers, release dates and details were shared with fans . The fifth season of "Stranger Things" will be released in three parts on the following dates .  Netflix has two Christmas Day NFL games and "Stranger Things" episodes released . The other parts of the show also find release dates around holidays that could complicate family get-togethers and plans .  The Denver Broncos and Kansas City Chiefs will play at 8:15 p.m. ET, right when the new "Stranger Things" episodes will be released . Releasing episodes of the hit show around holidays will likely pay off for Netflix in the viewership charts .  Netflix averaged 24 million viewers for its two Christmas Day 2024 NFL games . 65 million Americans watched at least a portion of one of its two games during the day . The streamer also highlighted upcoming releases like "Wednesday" season 2 and "Squid Game" season 3 .  Netflix's 2025 lineup continues to look like one of the best among streamers . ‘Scrolling To UBI’ — Deloitte's #1 fastest-growing software company allows users to earn money on their phones .
